May the Lord bless you and give you much of His Holy Spirit wherever you may labor. If it be your lot to educate students, that
93
they may impart to others the heavenly intelligence, I shall be pleased. I have always loved and respected you, and I have not been disappointed in you. The form of sound words is to be prized above every earthly thing. God is glorified by every word that leads to right action. I respect you highly and desire you to have every advantage possible, that you may make continual progression in the service of God.--Letter 265, 1905.
